      • searchLocal

        public flight.SeatsCollect searchLocal(airport.Airport s,
                                       airport.Airport d,
                                       timeWindow.TimeWindow st,
                                       java.lang.Integer legs,
                                       flight.SeatType seatType)
        Parameters:
        s - depart airport
        d - arrival airport
        st - depart time window
        legs - number of stops allowed
        seatType - coach or first class or both
        Returns:
        a collection of seats, where each seats will be multiple ticket from s to d
